title: grad_unwarp
description: Convert, dewarp, and resample DICOM files to MGH files.

infile.title: Input file
infile.description: Input file or directory (dcmfile, dcmdir, or mghfile)

seriesno.title: Series number
seriesno.description: DICOM series number, required if input is a directory

unwarp_type.title: Unwarp type
unwarp_type.description: Gradient unwarping displacement type or map file (required for MGH file)

nojac.title: Nojac flag
nojac.description: Do not perform jacobian correction when unwarping

cor.title: Cor format flag
cor.description: Output in COR format instead of MGH

matlab_binary.title: Matlab binary path
matlab_binary.description: Path to the Matlab binary, version 6.5 or higher required
